"Where have you come from?
He said.
Deshan.
He said.
"Deshan Tai is his wife's son.

"What kind of son is a wife?
He said.
When the superior seat asked him.
He made him stand up and piss on the ground.
He left in peace.
He wrote a verse about the causes and conditions of Mazu's agitation, saying.
"The sun faces the moon.
A flash of spiritual lightning.
